markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Staggering Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=3450) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443)

**Requirements**
You're riding a megafauna companion that has a melee Strike.

</column>

---

You've trained your megafauna companion to stagger its enemies, impeding their ability to fight back. You [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) to order your megafauna companion to spend both its actions making a single, powerful Strike. The attack deals an extra die of weapon damage, and if the attack hits and deals damage, the target is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until the end of its next turn.
name: Staggering Blow
requirement: You're riding a megafauna companion that has a melee Strike.
